entities.name: peter
entities.description: Peter is mentioned as someone who is at Hogwarts and has the ability to act if a hint reaches his ears that the Dark Side is gathering strength again. He is also referred to as 'the last Potter' and it is implied that he is still alive.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is at Hogwarts with Peter and is the target of Lord Voldemort. He is also referred to as 'the last Potter'.

entities.name: pettigrew

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as the target of Harry and Peter, and it is implied that he has a strong following or 'allies'.
